results.content: Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more.
results.author: Nikola Tesla

results.content: Let the future tell the truth and evaluate each one according to his work and accomplishments. The present is theirs; the future, for which I have really worked, is mine.
results.author: Nikola Tesla
